name: Academy of Arts & Sciences
description:
Village:
Sector: 4.5
Address:
Location: 4:15 & Carny, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Our camp is focused on the intersection of Art and Science. We have an eclectic group, with some hardcore science types with awesome art instincts (like a real live aerospace engineer that does body painting) and some amazing art types that love science. This year, we will have interactive classes teaching burners about science that can be used to create art, as well as art that makes science real. We strive to balance the left/right brain dichotomy with a range of activities to meet our fellow Burners’ diverse tastes.We will be providing a wide range of activities on the playa. This year we are able to add night time activities in addition to our day time events. Some activities include:· Bismuth crystal making · Triple pendulums, separate Night and Day versions! See the prototype here! http://www.flickr.com/photos/mrscience/8654430636 · Harmonograph · Measurement of the earth’s procession · GPS trackering – wondering where you were last night? · Pneumatic can crusher- hours of fun creating ammo · Tasty beverage density columns · A veritable crap-ton of optical gadgets and more! We will have a complete listing in Who/What/Where plus a reader board in camp with details of the subjects and times. The list above are the activities we already have planned and built (where building is required). In addition to our daily activities, we generally strive to have a few impromptu events, such as last year’s Bacon and Socks on Thursday morning. Frankly, we were surprised how many people on the playa needed socks, and it was yet another opportunity to meet new people.The Bad Idea Bar will continue to operate throughout the week providing refreshing beverages upon request. Give us a bad idea and we’ll give you a bad drink. Bad ideas are listed and derogatory comments made throughout the week. At the end we have the community choose the best of the worst ideas, then celebrate the winners and losers with more bad drinks. The bar is always op en when we are around and you are of age.Feeling up for a view? Come inspect the playa and the friendliest neighborhood at Black Rock from our viewing platform. We are happy to share our view as it gives us a chance to learn a little more about you. Finally, and most important during the day, you want shade? We’ve got shade. Over 800 square feet of cool goodness with comfy seating and a filled ice jug are always available. Sit down and relax, get to know us a little better (and vice versa) and decide if you’d like to learn a bit more about the intersection of science and art.

We strive to balance the left/right brain dichotomy with a range of activities to meet our fellow Burners’ diverse tastes.We will be providing a wide range of activities on the playa. This year we are able to add night time activities in addition to our day time events. Some activities include:· Bismuth crystal making · Triple pendulums, separate Night and Day versions! See the prototype here! http://www.flickr.com/photos/mrscience/8654430636 · Harmonograph · Measurement of the earth’s procession · GPS trackering – wondering where you were last night? · Pneumatic can crusher- hours of fun creating ammo · Tasty beverage density columns · A veritable crap-ton of optical gadgets and more! We will have a complete listing in Who/What/Where plus a reader board in camp with details of the subjects and times. The list above are the activities we already have planned and built (where building is required). In addition to our daily activities, we generally strive to have a few impromptu events, such as last year’s Bacon and Socks on Thursday morning. Frankly, we were surprised how many people on the playa needed socks, and it was yet another opportunity to meet new people.The Bad Idea Bar will continue to operate throughout the week providing refreshing beverages upon request. Give us a bad idea and we’ll give you a bad drink. Bad ideas are listed and derogatory comments made throughout the week. At the end we have the community choose the best of the worst ideas, then celebrate the winners and losers with more bad drinks. The bar is always op en when we are around and you are of age.Feeling up for a view? Come inspect the playa and the friendliest neighborhood at Black Rock from our viewing platform. We are happy to share our view as it gives us a chance to learn a little more about you. Finally, and most important during the day, you want shade? We’ve got shade. Over 800 square feet of cool goodness with comfy seating and a filled ice jug are always available. Sit down and relax, get to know us a little better (and vice versa) and decide if you’d like to learn a bit more about the intersection of science and art.

Description: The Phage is an homage to the vast dark ecology whose foment gave birth to Earth's living diversity. These ubiquitous viral life forms evolve faster than any other life on earth. In their furious co-optive radiations, they have acted as the vital genetic pollinators that wove long-separated lines of cellular life into resplendent new threads - the phage are the needles of life's tapestry. Beware if you encounter us: memetic biohazards lie ahead.

Our fabulous bartenders hog-craft each and every Bloody Mary we make with over 10 different ingredients. Sizzling strips of pork are hoof-served to the squealing swine wallowing on our shaded sofas. All vegetarians are welcomed (to be converted) at our event. Get your trotters tapping with DJ Julio playing some of the best (and obscure) disco you’ll ever hear. It kicks off around 11-ish in the morning. Just bring a cup and a smile. It’ll be sooey-eet.
Events: Saturday, Monday, Wednesday, and Friday: 11 AM-ish to 1 PM-ish

name: Camp Afterglow
description:
Village:
Sector: 4.5
Address:
Location: 4:45 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Afterglow: that wonderful feeling that lingers long after the experience has elapsed -- a feeling that only occurs when the mind, body, and soul has been ever so stimulated. Our gift to the Playa and to its dear citizens is Afterglow!
Events: Mobility and Rebalancing Workshop Realign from head to toe going through each joint and section in the body. The intention is to explore and play. To step out of our comfort zones and to connect deeper.
Tuesday, September 1st, 2015 11 a.m. – noon

Tea Time with Performance by John Craigie
Tuesday, September 1st, 2015 3 p.m. – 5 p.m.

Capoeira Capoeira: Capoeira is an Afro-Brazilian art form that combines martial arts, music and dance. The workshop will explore some of the basic movements and how they fit together to create a dialogue between players. Come play!
Wednesday, September 2nd, 2015 11 a.m. – noon

Socially Awkward 101: Take an amusing journey into the world of the socially awkward. Learn how it manifests and discover all it has to offer.
Wednesday, September 2nd, 2015 noon – 1 p.m.

Yoga: Ashtanga/Hatha Rough night? Come get re-centered and balanced with some morning yoga.
Thursday, September 3rd, 2015 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.

BYOUke Come by with your Ukulele and share in some music and laughter at our BYOUke Workshop. Learn a thing or two...or three about rhythm, harmony, and melody on this wonderful little instrument!
Thursday, September 3rd, 2015 noon – 1 p.m.

Tea Time Tea Time with Performances by John Nash & The One Night Wonder
Thursday, September 3rd, 2015 3 p.m. – 5 p.m.

House Dance Workshop: We will dance and play with different rhythms and patterns in the body.
Friday, September 4th, 2015 11 a.m. – noon

I2M Contact Improv: Interactive improvisation is what we do in life every day: driving, meeting people, working together. When it comes to dancing we have so many opportunities to interact in ways that we don't always give ourselves permission to do. In our time together we will look at options for moving together, playfully, respectfully and with calculated risk.
Friday, September 4th, 2015 noon – 1 p.m.

Mad Hatter's Tea Party: Enter the psychedelic world of the Mad Hatters Tea Party for complete unity with the cosmos. For every hat there's a different expression of the universe, for every expression there's a different impression left. No matter how long you stay- the experience stays with you longer… welcome to Afterglow. Bring your Mad Hat!!
Saturday, September 5th, 2015 3 p.m. – 5 p.m.

Address:

Description: Covered in Bees Offers a bee-themed Hive Lounge and Bar featuring home-brewed honey beers and whiskey infusions. Our incredible 1500 LED lighting covers our dome in an interactive fashion utilizing Microsoft Connect allowing visitors to manipulate the mood and patterns. Out front is our returning fire spinning space & burn barrel for fire comfort! The chill / lounge space includes a hookah bar. We support and promote bee awareness helping educate the public to the plight of colony collapse and similar issues while promoting bee keeping legislation. Our camp also hosts the Bombus Regius art car (pending DMV approval !)

name: dEOxidized
description:
Village:
Sector: 3
Address:
Location: 3:00 & Kook, Black Rock City, NV
Description: dEOxidized Camp is dedicated to recharging the batteries of all hard working burners. The camp is comprised of members of an Entrepreneurs Organization along with guests from all over the world. Together we will co-create an unforgettable experience with our community of friends, old and new. Our main attraction will be a 50' parachute featuring a lounge-type chill space with an open bar, live music, and happy hour everyday from 3 to Sunset. There will also be a stage for impromptu performance, educational talks, and well planned workshops throughout the day: ie, Yoga, bicycle workshops. We have members from all over the United States and as far as Dubai, New Zealand, and Mexico. We are a diverse group of burners with much to share and look forward to meeting you!

name: Gymnasium
description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address:
Location: 7:30 Portal, Black Rock City, NV
Description: We want to recreate the atmosphere of the Gymnasium in its original, Ancient Greek meaning, as a facility for training and competition in public games, as well a place for socializing and engaging in intellectual pursuits. The term originates from the word [gymnós] meaning “naked”, because historically in Ancient Greece one exercised naked, and we would like to revive this aspect too, as we think that by doing athletic and fun activities naked, participants will experience bonding aspect of such events stronger.
Events:
Link: http://activenaturists.net/burning-man-2015/

name: Naked Rainbow
description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address:
Location: 7:45 & Ballyhoo, Black Rock City, NV
Description: "Welcome to Naked Rainbow, the Strip Club for your Soul. Expose your dreams. Flash your fears. Bend over, spread your cheeks and give us a bare-assed view of your inner self. Our safe, open, meaningful and interactive environment plies you with mimosas, Harry Potter cocktails and good conversations to get you naked — spiritually naked, that is. Share your aspirations on the Tree of Dreams. Unburden your woes on the Tree of Prayers. Take a quiet moment out of your day to pray or meditate. Align your mind and spirit with Mimosa Vinyasa (Wed 5-6PM BYOM). Connect to each other at our modern partner-dancing workshops in costume (Tutu Tuesday 4:30-6PM + Bunny Thursday 3-4:30PM)! Join us for our Harry Potter cocktail hour dressed in your favorite house or color of the rainbow (Friday 5-7PM BYOC, starting with Andy’s standup routine)! We dare you to come sit in the Bad Advice Chair. You may even find yourself in the middle of an impromptu flow jam or fire spinning session. Even if it’s something as simple as dancing to our live beats or relaxing in the shade of our visually stimulating Dome, we hope you leave the Naked Rainbow with the most vibrant hues of your soul revealed.

Hometown: Los Angeles + San Francisco"
Events:
Link:
Description:

name: Playa Glass
description:
Village:
Sector: 6
Address:
Location: 6:30 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Ever wonder what's in playa dust? The special formula is just right for some solar glass making. Grab a pair of our welding goggles and we'll set you up at a Fresnel lens station where you'll raise the temperature of the dust to over 1000F and melt it in to black glass. Turn it in to a wearable pendant at the craft table and you'll have an easier-than-a-bag-of-dust way to take the playa back to the default world.
Events:
Link: http://capeandislands.org/post/breaking-down-dust
Description: Ever wonder what's in playa dust? The special formula is just right for some solar glass making. Grab a pair of our welding goggles and we'll set you up at a Fresnel lens station where you'll raise the temperature of the dust to over 1000F and melt it in to black glass. Turn it in to a wearable pendant at the craft table and you'll have an easier-than-a-bag-of-dust way to take the playa back to the default world.

name: Shots for Shocks
description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address:
Location: 7:30 & Freak Show, Black Rock City, NV
Description: We are a kinky electro-bar with a focus on consent, new experiences, and shenanigans! You can find us at 7:30 and Freakshow. Whether you're into electrical play, cigars, or puppies and ponies, we've got a little something for everyone.
Events: "Bad Idea Bingo
Mon - Sat, All Day!
Pick up a bingo card from ""Shots for Shocks!"", perform a variety of ""bad ideas"" at neighborhood camps and bring your card back for a prize!

Shocktails and Zappy Hour!
Mon - Sat, 12pm - 4pm
Have an electrifying experience at ""Shots for Shocks!"" Let us zap you with a cattle prod and we'll reward you with a delicious hand-infused shot for your bravery. We'll also have the Invisible Maze for those who are feeling extra brave, and the delights and horrors of Bertie Bott's Every Flavor Vodka Roulette! Bring ID, 18+ for shocks and play, 21+ for alcohol.

Sculpt Your Cock
Tues, 12pm - 4pm
Do you have a prize cock that is a work of art and should be on display? Get your penis cast and turned in to a sculpture by artist Lily Priest. All penises: sizes, shapes should be celebrated. Needed: hard cocks and fluffers. Participants only. 18+, bring ID.
This event will NOT be in the physical WWW book. Make a note of it now!

Polyamory 101 for Singles, Secondaries, and Solos
Tues, 5pm - 6:30pm
Interested in non-monogamy, but think it's just for couples ""opening up""? Let's talk about entering the scene single, taking care of your heart, and creating the relationships that are best for YOU! With Seattle instructor and sex positive activist Rose Riley.

Pet Play Mosh!
Tues, 7pm - 9pm
Pony? Puppy? Kitty? Unicorn? Hedgehog? All you crazy critters are welcome to come mosh! This is an open meet and greet and play event for pets, handlers, and people who are curious about pet play in general! 18+, bring ID
This event will NOT be in the physical WWW book. Make a note of it now!

Sensual Pleasures Cigar Lounge
Wed, 5pm - 8pm
Indulge ALL your vices at this sex positive cigar meet-up, hosted by ""Shots for Shocks!"" Come hang out in our luscious lounge and smoke the afternoon away with fellow fetishists. We'll have plenty of supplies and a few cigars to share, but bring favorites, scotch, and BYO human ashtray! 18+, bring ID

Kinky Life Drawing!
Thurs, 5pm - 8pm
""Shots for Shocks!"" gets artistic! Bring your sketch pads and get ready to sketch things your art teacher never taught you about! We'll provide hard lemonade and some supplies. Models, riggers, etc, VERY welcome. 18+, bring ID

Shocks for Scotch w/ Shots for Shocks!
Thurs, 8pm - 11pm
Electro-scotch at ""Shots for Shocks!"" Brave the cattle prod to earn entry into our fancy whiskey tasting, or to indulge in an Old Fashioned. Or bring your own and just come to relax in our luxurious lounge. Cigars and shenanigans also on tap! Bring ID, 18+ for shocks and play, 21+ for booze."
Link: http://playaevents.burningman.org/playa_event/search/2015/?search=shots+for+shocks

name: Camp Soft Landing
description:
Village:
Sector: 9
Address:
Location: 9:15 & Ersatz, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Camp Soft Landing offers a comfortable space to drink tea, hydrate, rest, tell stories, and participate in workshops. Soft Landing sponsors and staffs the Full Circle Tea House, which is planning to return to the playa for the 5th year to offer fine pu'erh tea and herbal infusions in the Chinese Gung Fu tradition. Servers provide tea and empathy, and comfortable spaces for rest, hydration, and quiet conversation 24 hours a day. The Full Circle Tea House will be hosting a satellite Zendo in our camp this year. The Zendo project is coordinated by volunteers organized and trained by the Multidisciplinary Association for Psychedelic Studies (MAPS). Soft Landing also presents the Palenque Norte speaker series featuring 40 visionary talks and stories spanning concepts such as technology, medicine, art, science, design, and entheobotany. These events take place in the Palenque Norte circus tent which also hosts small musical performances and yoga.

Link: http://www.campsoftlanding.com

name: The Green Goddess
description:
Village:
Sector: 4.5
Address:
Location: 4:45 & Hanky Pank, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The GREEN GODDESS invites Burning Man Participants of All Ages to join us for refreshments and reflection while nourishing your body with delightful tastes of fermented foods and beverages. Stop by for "Healthy Hour" from 2pm-5pm on Tuesday and Thursday to enjoy healthy homemade fermented refreshments while relaxing in our lounge space listening to soothing mantras and classical-infused electronic vibes, staying cool under the solar-powered water misters. Join us the Green Goddess on Monday and Wednesday morning (10:30am to Noon) for the "Fermented Goodness" workshop and learn about the benefits of probiotic foods including how to make them for yourself at home! All interested class participants will be gifted a kombucha or water kefir "starter kit" to use at home.

Negative ions are known to create an overall feeling of wellness similar to the air after a summer thunderstorm.

name: The Dreamaginatorium
description:
Village:
Sector: 6
Address:
Location: 6:00 Plaza, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The Dreamaginatorium aims to foster a sense of wonder joy and excitement. We create a space and energy of play exploration and creativity that helps people get in touch with their deepest dreams, hopes, and desires, and inspires them to follow their heart and pursue these dreams. We do this primarily through sublime art and participatory improvisational performance that induces heart and mind, opening experiences to remind people of the magic all around them and inside themselves.
Events: "Wednesday & Thursday 6-8pm: Skitzophreniation
Join us for a 15m interactive audio experience. We provide a radio with headphones and an audio track guiding you how to interact – alone, with others, and with your surroundings. It’s wacky, wild and social. You may not know what’s going on, but you’ll have fun figuring it out!

You can also feel free to stop by another time to hang out, and if we're available, we'll set it up for you and up to 24 friends."

name: School of Safe Sex
description:
Village:
Sector: 3
Address:
Location: 3:30 & Ballyhoo, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The School of Safe Sex provides an inviting, casual, relaxing, judgment free, environment for guests from all corners of the globe and all walks of life to come together for an amazing burn. This is our way to unite the community through a positive and educational experience involving love and sensuality regardless of gender or sexual preferences.
We will have 800 square feet of shaded space for rest and relaxation in addition to a school yard with activities for our fellow burners to utilize 24/7.
We will offer interactive classes in the shaded school space where our fellow burners can discuss various sexual topics, ideas and fantasies. Though a class instructor will be provided each day, we can all learn from one another so class participation is strongly encouraged. We look forward to teaching, learning, loving, valuing and believing in others and ourselves all while having a sexy good time! We encourage everyone to arrive on time so that the classes can begin on schedule. It will also allow all those that wish to attend the opportunity to get a class snack and be entered for the chance to spin the prize wheel; there will be 15 prizes given out daily. The prizes will be an assortment of quality sex toys and hygiene kits.
We will have condom dispensers at the school and on the school buses where fellow burners can take condoms as needed throughout the week. This is our way to help Black Rock City stay safe and sex positive.
We will have two 1920's style mutoscopes at the school and two at center camp. These mutoscopes will have a variety of tasteful yet sultry and fun adult movies. The movies will be changed daily so we encourage everyone to stop by and checkout the new flicks of the day.
Events: 1 PM daily class on sexually related topics. 24 hour relaxing atmosphere, games, playground equipment. Each class participant will receive a handmade, numbered, School of Safe Sex necklace and a class time snack. We will use the numbers on the back of each necklace for our random drawing to see who gets to spin the prize wheel at the end of each class. Each lucky spinner is guaranteed a prize!! All prizes are brand new and of awesome quality! The following pictures are of the exact prizes that will be given away. We will also be handing out, by various means, nifty hygiene kits. These kits are great if you forgot to bring something with you to the playa or have run out of something. We are all about keeping our fellow burners happy and healthy!

Come on by, fill your cup and experience live performed laser light shows to amazing DJ’s in the dome. Be sure to check Spanky’s Wine Bar listings for daily events at the bar and in the dome! Live events will be broadcast on 100.5 FM Radio Free Spanky’s! Performers Invited. Contact us for details.
Also, home of Eros Tangeré, a one-on-one “tactile performance” that can only be described as a sensation experience that is created as your very body is played as if it were an ever changing organic musical instrument. Your body becomes the surface upon which amazing erotic sensations will cascade with the undulations of an amazing music track and scent. Imagine that you can FEEL the expression of music with your body.

name: Shamandome
description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address:
Location: 7:00 & Arcade, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Shamandome is a collective of "Shamanistas" - people interested in developing the understanding and practice of ancient healing wisdom for the good of others and ourselves. Shamanistas collaborate with Spirit and help you break through negative patterns to create a new reality by re-directing energy. We find joy, community, identity and healing in utilizing the right side of the brain through shamanic journeying, and in helping others do the same.

Our tradition does not use drugs or plant medicines, we use only drumming and rattling for journeying.

Unleash your Power Animal!
Wake up the Shaman in you!

Exercise more of your options in Life, Mind, Body, Spirit, Cosmos and Heart.

description:
Village:
Sector: 4.5
Address:
Location: 4:45 & Geek, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Essence provides BRC residents with beautiful art to experience as they navigate the streets. Computer controlled lamps are hanging in the front of our camp for everyone to see, and illuminate the area. Art will be displayed on the front walls facing the street. Essence also promotes interactivity through the mediation/self-discovery/divination card desk. In the card room in the front of the camp, people can sit down and learn how to use the Essentia Card Deck to understand themselves and other people better in a very interactive way. A deck will be given to burners that would like a copy for themselves, allowing them to interact with other burners and to explore their own inner world.

name: Camp Illuminaughty
description:
Village:
Sector: 9
Address:
Location: 8:45 & Ersatz, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Dance, drink, and soul grabbing illumination are what Camp Illuminaughty brings to the denizens of Black Rock City. As a veteran group of six years, our camp has learned a few things. Foremost is that we’re all nocturnal people. We live by night and sleep by day. This year we are continuing our theme as a night-oriented interactive light themed camp.

Each year our camp brings with it the Wall of Light, our mobile interactive video wall that is designed to get people up and moving to the party. The video wall responds to sound and body movements using a Kinect sensor. Each dancer appears as a silhouette, showing the contours of their figure with gradients of brightness. The wall is bright and colorful, with a low-rez style that frees dancers of their inhibitions, mesmerizing interactees and onlookers alike. The Wall of Light debuted in 2013 and drew a crowd wherever it went.

Each night we ceremoniously illuminate the camp and draw in our neighbors and fellow citizens for drinks, dance and all of the illuminated naughtiness that can be expected on the playa. We have a second stationary video wall, light sculptures and illusions, and illuminated toys for all to enjoy. Guests can whet their palettes with drinks from our bar, groove to the music or rest on our ample seating.

Link:

name: Above the Limit
description:
Village:
Sector: 9
Address:
Location: 8:15 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Carnivals can take many forms, each seen through the complex mirrored lenses of the beholders. For some, a carnival conjures up images of rides, games, kaleidoscopic images, snow cones, cotton candy, and the smell of fresh popcorn. For others, a carnival is a festival of dazzling costumes, exotic masks, colorful lights, sounds, and textured fabrics. For still others, a parade is required. Above The Limit seeks to combine all of the above into a festival of interactivity, a time of celebration for carefree spirits seeking to make the most of their time before returning to penitence in the default world. Come grab a flaming shot at the flaming bar, a s'more by the fire, or a drink at the tiki bar!
Events:
Link: http://www.campabovethelimit.com/index.html

name: Camp Manifestation
description:
Village:
Sector: 6
Address:
Location: 6:15 & Hanky Pank, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The existence of Camp Manifestation is the outcome of a number of different inquiries, processes, learnings and creations that has given rise to a beautiful community of like-minded people, sharing, building, learning, growing and evolving themselves and the camp over time. As a camp we encourage and support people to examine the process of manifestation. In so doing one can come to find that each person is unique in their expression in the world and therefore what they manifest. Who you are - what you are designed for - is the primary force that empowers you to make your ideas come to pass. By aligning oneself with that design one can thrive. Then the sharing of what one creates in the world becomes a natural expression.

The vision of the camp involves exploring ones design, the very nature of creation and the realization of that power within each of us. That power enables us to manifest whatever is in one's heart thereby allowing one to experience life as one desires. By acknowledging and honoring our very human nature, putting intention toward the coupling of the power of thought combined with the moving force of action, we begin to see and experience the merging of these two forces which allows us to create magical results in the world.

Come bounce while you can in the upholstered luxury of our Bungee Couch Garden, sip the ambrosia of perpetual motion (champagne and 5-hour energy, the official libation of our Ultimate Celebration, available from 4-6pm daily), contemplate your own ultimate destination, wipe your filthy face with a hot towel, join in a campfire sing-along, or zip around on a Wiimote-controlled electric armchair. name: Furniture Car Rally Camp
description:
Village:
Sector: 3
Address:
Location: 3:15 & Jolly, Black Rock City, NV
Description: FCRC features several areas of interactivity: a plush, shaded lounge and bar, famously known as The Chevy Chaise Lounge, the famous Semi-Circular Driveway, allowing easy access for passing Furniture Cars (as most do not have reverse), and the infield area with an animated light fountain, "Desert Spring."
Events: On Thursday at 2pm, we will hold the largest Furniture Car Rally & Sunset Cruise in the world! The Rally will bring the community of furniture car creators, drivers, advocates, and fans together for the 9th year running, to do what we do best: comfortably go really slowly. The outcome: a whimsical furniture parade that roams the city streets.

name: The Love Beets
description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address:
Location: 7:45 & Ballyhoo, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Love happens in all kinds of ways, but we've found that on the playa, it happens especially when you find yourself sitting at a table with a random stranger sharing a meal you didn't even know you wanted! Our plan is to create incredible meals from the strange and wonderful *gifts* donated to us by those who happen by. Bring us whatever it is you have to "share" and we'll make you a meal fit for a king. We don't believe in waste, so nothing is ever refused, but it is truly amazing what can be created from the pile of seemingly nonsensical items that find their way to our table. What's more is what LOVE BUBBLES literally bubble up and start popping as people gather together in our tent, the conversation starts flowing, friendships are formed over a shared meal and before we all know it the sunrise is peaking over the mountains because we've all shared all the wine and the pots just kept getting filled and the love never stopped flowing.

To participate, you just have to have an open heart and hopefully *something* to contribute to our gathering. It might be a song, it may be a poem, you may just want to take a turn stirring the pot. Or maybe you wish to up the ante and ask us to somehow incorporate all that dusty granola in the bottom of your pockets? We're up for it. We're magicians... making magic out of dust.

We provide a chance to participate just by being you. We also provide a chance to participate by joining our table and sharing who you are with everyone else who is present. This is not about just standing in a line and receiving something and going on your merry way. The Love Beets love kitchen is all about lovingly allowing you to co-create with us a meal that continues to truly feed the very heart-beat of the playa. What you bring becomes part of that and you get to participate in whatever way you're most comfortable. Also, we'll teach you about LNT, by asking that you provide your own cup and utensils and if you've not got them, you can use one of our up cycled LOVE BEET bliss cup combos and even take it along with you (we hope you'll even come back) and remember to use it all along the playa. Our camp runs on mostly solar power and is a throw-back to early Burning Man days where we all shared a little bit of everything we had to make it all happen. We are going to ask that if you show up, you share a little bit of YOU. Whatever that might be to help make it all happen. It's magic as it unfolds, in the dust. Real love and magic. And it really does happen. Everyone is included, everything is impermanent, everything is just as it should be. We'll all look in our mirrors and ask, ""What do we see?"" and contemplate the answers while sharing lots of love and beets.

Also, plan to come and roast some green coffee beans yourself and maybe take some home to the default world, Playa dust included for free.

Description: Anam Cara is the Gaelic term for "soul friend".
We are a group of people, bound in this earthly life as a family, a tribe of souls who enlighten the light within one another and aim to do the same with those we meet.

name: Temple of Fluff
description:
Village: Fandango!
Sector: 9
Address:
Location: 9:00 & Kook, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Temple of Fluff is a space designed to be as comfortable as feasibly possible. An individual entering Temple passes through a shaded entrance for shoe removal (Shoelution provided for storage) and into a dome, 24 feet across, filled wall to wall with comfortable things to lay on. Pillows, beanbags, and cushions cover the floor, with couches on the perimeter, facing in. For the night, there are ample blankets and chill party lights overhead. In the back, a modest sound system to provide Temple’s inhabitants with music, should it somehow not be coming from elsewhere. The custom made dome cover can be raised so that those who are lounging may interact with those who are on the street, or it may be lowered to protect against dust and wind. We hope to provide a space where people can relax and be comfortable together, within the Fluff. We wish to create an environment in which, if you see interesting people on the other side of the Fluff, you never have to stop being comfortable as you roll your way over to them. Temple of Fluff will be open all week at Burning Man to anyone who wants to lay down for a while.
Events:
Link: https://www.facebook.com/TempleofFluff?fref=ts

name: Dragon Smelter
description:
Village: 4:30 Plaza
Sector: 4.5
Address:
Location: 4:30 & Arcade, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The Dragon Smelter was first created in 2000 as a way to demonstrate that recycling aluminum cans generated during and at the BM event by participants could be immediately recycled into fine art sculptural wall pieces.

Our coin gifting has been hugely successful. For the last five years daily during the BM event, we’ve worked in the sun and the dust along with large numbers of participants to explore and redefine notions of value together by to melting, pressing and recycling aluminum into coins which many participants then demanded that we help them turn into wearable pendants. In the spirit of BM we, naturally, acquiesced, set up a drill press and safety trained everyone who wanted to how to use it to drill a hole in the coin to hang iit from. There are now many more pendants made from our coin designs than pure coins!!
This coin pendant gifting reflects our deep belief in Burning Man values and that Black Rock City is a place where trade, barter and gifting are the rule, and money transactions are the exception,Our yearly coins may still be a medium of exchange, but their real value is to the beholder based upon their actual actions and interactions with other BM participant and the environment of BRC. We seek in our coin/pendant designs to depict these Burning Man values that to create a coin/pendant is about the beauty of the object, and the ideas of recycling, LNT and gifting actions action of the holder.

Finally, our goal is to teach and demystify metal arts by involving old and young volunteers in the making of the coins and the other larger casted metal sculptures out of recycled aluminum. Durning these events we will also teach safety practices and create an environment that is much like a metal workshop in any studio........except the costumes will be cooler !

Day or Night.Come one Come all to the Dragon Smelter !!!!

LOCATION: 4:30 PLAZA CENTER AT 1:30
Events: PRESS YOUR VERY OWN BURNING MAN COIN !!!!!!!
DAILY AUGUST 31 THRU SEPTEMBER 7TH 11AM -6PM

FIRE EFFECTS NIGHTLY Aug 31 thru Sept 7
STARTS AT DUSK
LASTS UNTIL HER BREATH RUNS OUT

SAND CASTING WORKSHOP- Wednesday September !st
STARTS AT 11AM

LARGE CASTING EVENT- Thursday September 2nd
STARTS AT 5PM

ALL EVENTS LOCATED AT THE DRAGON SMELTER
IN THE CENTER OF THE 4:30 PLAZA AT 1:30

Description: Boot Camp is the crew for Storied Haven, a large-scale honorarium art project. She is the keeper of stories, holder of memories, steward of dreams. In a fairytale world where animals talk and children shouldn’t wander the woods at night, an enchanted home inside of a grand boot lures us. It beckons to wayward passersby with a promise of fantastical delight and dark mystery.
